info.name: DNS SaaS Service Detection
author: noah @thesubtlety
pdteam
info.description: A CNAME DNS record was discovered

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 64181
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct-preprod.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.	IN	 CNAME
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 64181
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct-preprod.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.	IN	 CNAME

;; ANSWER SECTION:
facili-tacct-preprod.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.	300	IN	CNAME	sc-lb-pool-01.osc-fr1.scalingo-network.com.

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 59273
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct-preprod.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 59273
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;facili-tacct-preprod.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.	IN	 CAA

;; ANSWER SECTION:
facili-tacct-preprod.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.	300	IN	CNAME	sc-lb-pool-01.osc-fr1.scalingo-network.com.

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
scalingo-network.com.	1800	IN	SOA	burt.ns.cloudflare.com. dns.cloudflare.com. 2367279358 10000 2400 604800 1800

request:
OPTIONS / HTTP/1.1
Host: facili-tacct-preprod.osc-fr1.scalingo.io
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request
Connection: close
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Allow: GET
Allow: HEAD
Cache-Control: private, no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none'; connect-src * https://*.gouv.fr; font-src 'self'; media-src 'self'; img-src * 'self' data: https:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://stats.beta.gouv.fr *.posthog.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; object-src 'self' data:; frame-ancestors 'self' http://localhost:5174/* http://localhost:5174 http://localhost:5173/* http://localhost:5173 https://mon-espace-collectivite.osc-fr1.scalingo.io; base-uri 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; form-action 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; block-all-mixed-content ; upgrade-insecure-requests ; frame-src 'none';
Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy: credentialless
Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin
Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: cross-origin
Date: Sun, 06 Apr 2025 04:29:33 GMT
Permissions-Policy: fullscreen=(), display-capture=(), camera=(), microphone=(), geolocation=()
Referrer-Policy: no-referrer, strict-origin-when-cross-origin
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000
Vary: RSC, Next-Router-State-Tree, Next-Router-Prefetch, Next-Router-Segment-Prefetch
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: DENY
X-Request-Id: 48028b07-754d-4249-a91b-e77172c9ecbb
X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block

info.name: XSS-Protection Header - Cross-Site Scripting
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Cache-Control: s-maxage=31536000, Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none'; connect-src * https://*.gouv.fr; font-src 'self'; media-src 'self'; img-src * 'self' data: https:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://stats.beta.gouv.fr *.posthog.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; object-src 'self' data:; frame-ancestors 'self' http://localhost:5174/* http://localhost:5174 http://localhost:5173/* http://localhost:5173 https://mon-espace-collectivite.osc-fr1.scalingo.io; base-uri 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; form-action 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; block-all-mixed-content ; upgrade-insecure-requests ; frame-src 'none'; Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy: credentialless Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: cross-origin Date: Sun, 06 Apr 2025 04:29:41 GMT Etag: "bf8z4beggmp7j" Permissions-Policy: fullscreen=(), display-capture=(), camera=(), microphone=(), geolocation=() Referrer-Policy: no-referrer, strict-origin-when-cross-origin Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 Vary: RSC, Next-Router-State-Tree, Next-Router-Prefetch, Next-Router-Segment-Prefetch, Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: DENY X-Nextjs-Cache: HIT X-Nextjs-Prerender: 1 X-Nextjs-Stale-Time: 4294967294 X-Request-Id: a5626ff6-3b8e-48da-a60d-a246df2233a5 X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Facili-TACCT

Facili-TACCT intègre un nouveau jeu de données créé par Météo-France. Il vise à montrer comment cinq aléas climatiques (fortes chaleurs, fortes pluies, sécheresse des sols, feux de forêt et niveaux marins) vont évoluer entre 2050 et 2100.

Retrouvez également de nouveaux indicateurs : “Surfaces irriguées” (et sa thématique Agriculture) et “Feux de forêt”.

Vulnérable aux impacts du changement climatique ?

Objectivez votre diagnostic avec les données socio-économiques qui rendent votre territoire unique et découvrez des arguments et ressources pour mobiliser vos collègues et partenaires externes sur l'adaptation au changement climatique

Quel territoire représentez-vous ?

Evaluez la sensibilité de votre territoire

Déchiffrez les données socio-économiques qui rendent votre territoire unique

Facilitez les conditions du dialogue

Découvrez des ressources pour faciliter les conditions du dialogue avec vos élus, services techniques et partenaires

L'adaptation n'est possible qu’en intelligence collective

Les initiatives d'adaptation au changement climatique réussissent lorsqu'elles sont abordées de manière transversale et collaborative en impliquant les élus et différentes expertises thématiques.

République
Française

Facili-TACCT est un service développé par l'accélérateur de la transition écologique de l'ADEME.

  • info.gouv.fr
  • service-public.fr
  • legifrance.gouv.fr
  • data.gouv.fr
  • Accessibilité : non conforme
  • Mentions légales
  • Politique de confidentialité
  • Politique des cookies

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: Wildcard TLS Certificate
author: lucky0x0d
info.description: Checks a sites certificate to see if there are wildcard CN or SAN entries.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
